mapper.select: select sum(totalfee) as totalfee,to_date(to_char(a.createdon,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') as createdon from crd_membershipcard_base a left join crd_membershipcard_user b on a.cardno=b.cardno left join user_base uc on uc.userid=b.userid left join org_store os on uc.storeid=os.id where os.name=#{name} and a.createdon>= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{datebegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') and a.createdon<=TO_TIMESTAMP(#{dateend}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') group by a.createdon ORDER BY a.createdon asc

select cmu.userid as usernumber from crd_membershipcard_base cmb left join Crd_MembershipCard_User cmu on cmb.cardno=cmu.cardno left join Crd_MembershipCard_Purchase cmp on cmb.CardNo=cmp.CardNo where userid in
#{id} ::bigint
and cmb.cardend<to_timestamp(#{today},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and cmb.State=0 and cmp.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and cmp.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and cmp.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint

select cm.userid from Crd_MembershipCard_Purchase cmp left join Crd_MembershipCard_User cm on cm.cardno=cmp.cardno
cmp.BuyType='C'
and cm.userid in
#{userid} :: bigint
and cmp.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and cmp.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and cmp.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
group by userid;

select userid from( select count(cm.UserId) as times,userid,buytype from crd_membershipcard_purchase cmp left join crd_membershipcardcategory_base c on cmp.cardid = c.cardid left join Crd_MembershipCard_Base cmsb on cmsb.cardno=cmp.cardno left join Crd_MembershipCard_User cm on cm.cardno=cmp.cardno where cmsb.isfree=false and cmp.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and cmp.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and cmp.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
group by cm.UserId,buytype) as a
times>=#{times}
and buytype=#{buytype}
and UserId in
#{userid} :: bigint

select count(cm.userid) from crd_membershipcard_purchase cmp left join crd_membershipcardcategory_base c on cmp.cardid = c.cardid left join Crd_MembershipCard_User cm on cm.cardno=cmp.cardno left join Crd_MembershipCard_Base cmsb on cmsb.cardno=cmp.cardno where cmsb.isfree=false and cmp.buytype='F' and c.coursetype=#{coursetype} and cmp.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and cmp.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and cmp.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
and cm.userid in
#{userid} :: bigint
group by userid
select Times,Points,OriginalFee from Crd_MembershipCard_Base where CardNo=#{cardno}
select cardname,originalfee,cardend from crd_membershipcard_base where cardno =#{cardno}
